input.sentences: the military prepared for the march from the castle .
the guards stood at hand as the carriage passed through the street .
dozens of decorated horse and men were at hand .
a dignitary marched out to greet the carriage .
the queen remained out of sight in her carriage all the while .
output.sentences: The Queen's guards were dressed in brilliant red.
They stood watch as her procession made its way down the street.
Men dressed in formal attire processed down the street as well.
I caught glimpse of the Queen as her carriage went by.
